articles.title: Earth’s Secret Hydrogen Jackpot: Enough Clean Power for 170,000 Years - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Scientists may have found a clean hydrogen jackpot underground, with a new recipe to find and tap it.
articles.content:
Scientists may have found a clean hydrogen jackpot underground, with a new recipe to find and tap it.
Natural hydrogen trapped in the Earth’s crust could power humanity for millennia, and without em… [+5872 chars]
